languages.text: "Вы обыскивали отсеки, а надо было смотреть, куда ведут системы жизнеобеспечения. Мои ребята вынесли подозрительную переборку, и за ней оказалось целое логово мутантов".
"You were searching the compartments instead of checking out the life support systems. My crew knocked down a suspicious bulkhead and found an entire mutant lair behind it."
languages.original_text: "Вы обыскивали отсеки, а надо было смотреть, куда ведут системы жизнеобеспечения. Мои ребята вынесли подозрительную переборку, и за ней оказалось целое логово мутантов".

traits.locale_text: "You were searching the compartments instead of checking out the life support systems. My crew knocked down a suspicious bulkhead and found an entire mutant lair behind it."
"You were searching the compartments instead of checking out the life support systems. My crew knocked down a suspicious bulkhead and found an entire mutant lair behind it."
"You were searching the compartments instead of checking out the life support systems. My crew knocked down a suspicious bulkhead and found an entire mutant lair behind it."
"You were searching the compartments instead of checking out the life support systems. My crew knocked down a suspicious bulkhead and found an entire mutant lair behind it."
"You were searching the compartments instead of checking out the life support systems. My crew knocked down a suspicious bulkhead and found an entire mutant lair behind it."
"You were searching the compartments instead of checking out the life support systems. My crew knocked down a suspicious bulkhead and found an entire mutant lair behind it."

languages.text: "Ihr habt die Module durchsucht, anstatt die lebenserhaltenden Systeme zu überprüfen. Meine Crew hat hinter einem verdächtigen Schott ein Mutantenversteck entdeckt."
languages.original_text: "You were searching the compartments instead of checking out the life support systems. My crew knocked down a suspicious bulkhead and found an entire mutant lair behind it."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt die Module durchsucht, anstatt die lebenserhaltenden Systeme zu überprüfen. Meine Crew hat hinter einem verdächtigen Schott ein Mutantenversteck entdeckt."

languages.text: « Vous avez perdu votre temps en fouillant les compartiments au lieu d'inspecter les systèmes de survie. Mes hommes ont abattu une cloison suspecte derrière laquelle se cachait tout un nid de mutants. »
languages.original_text: "You were searching the compartments instead of checking out the life support systems. My crew knocked down a suspicious bulkhead and found an entire mutant lair behind it."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez perdu votre temps en fouillant les compartiments au lieu d'inspecter les systèmes de survie. Mes hommes ont abattu une cloison suspecte derrière laquelle se cachait tout un nid de mutants. »

languages.text: «Estaban registrando los compartimentos en vez de comprobar los sistemas de soporte vital. Mi gente derribó una mampara de aspecto sospechoso y halló una guarida de mutantes al otro lado».
languages.original_text: "You were searching the compartments instead of checking out the life support systems. My crew knocked down a suspicious bulkhead and found an entire mutant lair behind it."

traits.locale_text: «Estaban registrando los compartimentos en vez de comprobar los sistemas de soporte vital. Mi gente derribó una mampara de aspecto sospechoso y halló una guarida de mutantes al otro lado».

languages.text: 「生命維持装置を調べるのではなく、区画を捜索していたのか。私のクルーが不審な隔壁を倒したところ、その後ろに変異体の隠れ家があったぞ」
languages.original_text: "You were searching the compartments instead of checking out the life support systems. My crew knocked down a suspicious bulkhead and found an entire mutant lair behind it."

traits.locale_text: 「生命維持装置を調べるのではなく、区画を捜索していたのか。私のクルーが不審な隔壁を倒したところ、その後ろに変異体の隠れ家があったぞ」

languages.text: “因为你只检查了舱室，没检查过生命维持系统。我手下的人拆掉了一个可疑的船舱，结果在里面发现了一整个变种人巢穴。”
languages.original_text: "You were searching the compartments instead of checking out the life support systems. My crew knocked down a suspicious bulkhead and found an entire mutant lair behind it."

traits.locale_text: “因为你只检查了舱室，没检查过生命维持系统。我手下的人拆掉了一个可疑的船舱，结果在里面发现了一整个变种人巢穴。”

languages.text: "Yaşam destek sistemlerine bakmak yerine kompartımanları aradınız. Mürettebatım, şüpheli bir bölme panelini indirip ardında koskocaman bir mutant ini buldu."
languages.original_text: "You were searching the compartments instead of checking out the life support systems. My crew knocked down a suspicious bulkhead and found an entire mutant lair behind it."
